original_text: And his master said unto him, We will not turn aside hither into the city of a stranger, that is not of the children of Israel; we will pass over to Gibeah.
korean_text: 주인이 그에게 이르되 우리가 돌이켜 이스라엘 자손에게 속하지 아니한 이방 사람의 성읍으로 들어갈 것이 아니니 기브아로 나아가리라 하고

sentences.original_text: And his master said unto him
We will not turn aside hither
into the city of a stranger
that is not of the children of Israel
we will pass over to Gibeah
